message:
#Asma
#Malala
& #Oishee ........
Asma is the symbol of #innocence,Malala the experience while Oishee is the epitome of #ultra-modernism- a slippery way to moral decadence and total degeneration. ¤ Every human is # bron as #Asma ,most of them #grow as #Malala and #falls as #Oishee ¤.All of them did what commoners don't.Both Asma & Malala could have been famous and Oishee the infamous.Out of these trio only rest others were accorded or rewarded for their glorious(sacrificing life for democracy) or inglorious (killing father & mother) works.
¤Thanks for Wahidul Islam(Editor for #Youth #Wave)
#k26
